tool_description: 交差点や道路検索など、車利用のシーンで、役に立つ情報が得られます。
name: NAVITIME Drive info
title: NAVITIME Drive info

api_list.name: road
api_list.description: キーワードを指定して道路情報を取得します。

optional_parameters.name: toll_types
optional_parameters.description:
Road toll classification.
(free, toll_highway, toll_local)

Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 100, Default value: 10)

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Roadway classification.
(highway or local)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Skips a given number of first data.
(Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 2000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description:
Address Code.

Can be specified up to the 5-digit city level.
For multiple specifications, specify with a period separator.

※Be sure to specify either word or address ( both can also be specified)

optional_parameters.name: word
optional_parameters.description:
Search word(road name).

※Be sure to specify either word or address ( both can also be specified)

api_list.name: ic
api_list.description: Return interchange information from free keyword or latitude/longitude of request parameters.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description:
Radius of search distances.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 10,000, Default value: 2,000)
The unit is \"\"meters\"\".

Available only when 'coord' is specified.

optional_parameters.name: word
optional_parameters.description:
Search word.

You cannot be used in combination with 'coord'.
Please be sure to specify either 'word' or 'coord'.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: coord
optional_parameters.description:
Latitude and longitude of the reference point for the search.
 (ex.35.689457,139.691935)
Available in milliseconds or degrees (decimal).

You cannot be used in combination with 'word'.
Please be sure to specify either 'word' or 'coord'.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 20, Default value: 10)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Interchange type (entrance：Interchange entrance, exit：Interchange exit).
If not specified, search for both entrance and exit.

api_list.name: shape_road
api_list.description: Return informations of road shape to draw lines on a map from the road ID of request parameters.

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

api_list.name: intersection
api_list.description:
Return lists of intersections corresponding to the keyword specified by request parameters.
You can also output the distance to the intersection from the specified latitude and longitude.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description:
Radius of search distances.
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 10000, Default value: 2000)
The unit is \"meters\".

Available only when 'coord' is specified.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Skips a given number of first data.
(Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 2000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limits the number of response data. (Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 100, Default value: 10)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: coord
optional_parameters.description: Latitude and longitude.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)
